Articles.Content:
> 
> We can amputate (holds up Shardblade)

Do it and I amputate your head.
Unfortunately, our doctors on the Citadel did everything they could to heal the injury, but, the injury never healed correctly

> 
> Unfortunately, our doctors on the Citadel did everything they could to heal the injury, but, the injury never healed correctly

Well then I say your doctors are not fit to it! I can use fixated-Verterons to bring it back into anatomical sync with your other one.

> 
> Do it and I amputate your head.

Okay. There's nothing in there anyway.

> 
> Okay. There's nothing in there anyway.

[Good point]
\*thinks\* Ok, let's try it.

(Swings Shardblade)

(leg blackens and dies)
Alright. This will feel a bit... weird. It wont hurt, but it may feel like bugs crawling on you for 20 seconds. After that, good as new! [Hopefully Guaranteed]

> 
> \*thinks\* Ok, let's try it.

He said to try it.

- - - Updated - - -

But won't that make him have 2 left feet?

> 
> He said to try it.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> But won't that make him have 2 left feet?

[Nope. Anatomical sync is the body's form of symmetry mode]

> 
> He said to try it.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> But won't that make him have 2 left feet?

I was speaking to Xannari

(EVERYBODY DO THE FLOP! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) sorry, I watch too much asdf)
[Castlevania was just straight up HARD]
[i'm thoroughly amused reading this, though I am concerned the mods may interpret it as an RP and start throwing around kiboshes. Mods, if you're reading this, this is too funny to put a stop to.]

(Secretly clicks symmetry mode on you device)

Sampa: Whoa, I have 3 legs!
(Castlevania?)

> 
> [i'm thoroughly amused reading this, though I am concerned the mods may interpret it as an RP and start throwing around kiboshes. Mods, if you're reading this, this is too funny to put a stop to.]

What's an RP?

> 
> (Castlevania?)

[...

Please tell me you know it...]

> What's an RP?

(role play)

> 
> [...
> Please tell me you know it...]

looks it up... OH YEAH!
[[Totally not showing off my skills or anything. Not at all...](http://www./listen/c09qw9eqmk17tao/Dance+of+the+Holyman.wav)]
(WOW, you are almost as good as my older sister (maybe a little better))
[Not at all. This took over 900 recordings to get right. It felt like playing the first game [HARD]]

What?
